00063 /* Functions to create GPU Materials nodes */

00065 typedef enum GPUType {
00066     GPU_NONE = 0,
00067     GPU_FLOAT = 1,
00068     GPU_VEC2 = 2,
00069     GPU_VEC3 = 3,
00070     GPU_VEC4 = 4,
00071     GPU_MAT3 = 9,
00072     GPU_MAT4 = 16,
00073     GPU_TEX2D = 1002,
00074     GPU_SHADOW2D = 1003,
00075     GPU_ATTRIB = 3001
00076 } GPUType;

00178 typedef enum GPUDataType {
00179     GPU_DATA_NONE = 0,
00180     GPU_DATA_1I = 1,    // 1 integer
00181     GPU_DATA_1F = 2,
00182     GPU_DATA_2F = 3,

00189 
00190 /* this structure gives information of each uniform found in the shader */
00191 typedef struct GPUInputUniform {
00192     struct GPUInputUniform *next, *prev;
00193     char varname[32];       /* name of uniform in shader */
00194     GPUDynamicType type;    /* type of uniform, data format and calculation derive from it */
00195     GPUDataType datatype;   /* type of uniform data */
00196     struct Object *lamp;    /* when type=GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_... or GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DSHADOW */
00197     struct Image *image;    /* when type=GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DIMAGE */
00198     int texnumber;          /* when type=GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER, texture number: 0.. */
00199     unsigned char *texpixels;   /* for internally generated texture, pixel data in RGBA format */
00200     int texsize;            /* size in pixel of the texture in texpixels buffer: for 2D textures, this is S and T size (square texture) */
00201 } GPUInputUniform;
00202 
00203 typedef struct GPUInputAttribute {
00204     struct GPUInputAttribute *next, *prev;
00205     char varname[32];   /* name of attribute in shader */
00206     int type;           /* from CustomData.type, data type derives from it */
00207     GPUDataType datatype;   /* type of attribute data */
00208     const char *name;   /* layer name */
00209     int number;         /* generic attribute number */
00210 } GPUInputAttribute;

00216     char *fragment;
00217 } GPUShaderExport;
